msbt.message: Dearest reader,
To whomever this may be,
To my faraway reader,
Dearest whoever you are,
My dear anonymous reader,
Whilst taking a much-needed hot bath, my mind dreamed up the most fabulous idea for a DIY recipe.
I was on an aimless stroll when an idea for the most wonderful DIY recipe came to me on the breeze.
I can NOT stop thinking about this furniture I saw in a dream! So, I have turned it into a DIY recipe.
I've grown weary of run-of-the-mill furniture. So, I have designed a DIY furniture recipe sure to inspire!
Would you believeâ€”an amazing DIY recipe simply popped into my mind as I was enjoying a cup of tea!
Of course, I believe great ideas such as mine MUST be shared.
Now I find myself compelled to share this recipe with others.
It would be cruel of me to keep this recipe to myself, so I am sharing.
I am compelled to share my recipe, so I have stuffed it in this bottle.
I cannot keep this idea to myself. So I have placed it in this bottle.
May it inspire you to action.
Please. Bring this recipe to life.
Try making it. You will not be sorry.
Do please consider making it!
It would please me if you made it.
Best wishes,
With hopes,
Your muse,
Sincerely,
Faraway wishes,

Are you paying proper attention to your appearance, darling? A mirror can help you put yourself together. I've included a DIY mirror recipe in this bottle. Do make one for yourself when the mood strikes.
